lines.text: Well, what'd you get out of him?
Nothing that would interest you.
Anything he'd say to you would interest me. Whether its about the market or not.
I told you. Nothing.
So, your fatal charm is beginning to fail, eh? Well, I'm not surprised. It couldn't last forever.
You think that, eh? Alright then, I'll tell you. It was too easy. Like that.
[Snaps fingers]
The market's perfectly alright. Everything's going up. Everything. This recession doesn't mean a thing. They're, they're simply trying to shake out the little fellows or something like that.
That's all I wanted to know. Get yourself something tomorrow. You've earned it.
Oh, I've enough jewelry now.
What's the matter with us, now, anyway? Seems to me the more money we make the more wretched we are. It wasn't this way when we were poor.

I'll tell you what it is. It's this unspoken conspiracy between us. I sinister tips with my charm and you convert them into money. And that's killed everything there ever was between us. Sometimes I'm half sick with shame at the things I do.
What do you think I am? Do you suppose I'd touch that money if it wasn't for you? How do you think I could hold you if I didn't make more money, year after year after year?
You really care for me a little bit? You'll love me when I'm old and gray?
I love you now.
I've seen you before, you know. In Hamilton, before you came here.
Where? In the bar? That's right. I was trying to drink myself to death. Oh, but it wasn't my fault, you know. I'm so young and women are so helpless.
Women aren't helpless. They're the most dangerous creatures alive.
Splendid! You look like a man who can face danger. Shall we take a walk?
Hello?
The party wishes to reverse the charges. It will be 24 dollars and 75 cents for the first 3 minutes and 8 dollars for...
Who is it?
Mr. Gault calling. Yes. Alright. Start talking please.
I'm not bored with New York. I'm bored with life.
I thought everybody was prosperous these days. The market's going higher and higher.
I wish you a great deal of unhappiness. It might make a living person of you.
How about your day? What happened in the market?

Very strange. Four million share day. Heavy selling and most of the stuff pretty well absorbed. Just for no reason. I can't find any explanation for it. Everything looks perfectly serene. Unless some of the big chaps are getting ready to unload.
Why don't you stop talking about business and look at me. That's better. Pay some attention to your wife. Other men find me - quite desirable, you know.
It's not my habit to do something, for nothing.
You English can be rude!
I don't care how I get you. I want you so.
Isn't it funny what a turn of the wheel will do. The same market that broke my husband, made yours rich.
Do you think that's quite square?
Tell me, are you really a sheepherder?
I raise sheep.
How do you find things, these days?
Oh, here and there, a glimmer of light in the gloom.
Well, there's no glimmer in my gloom.
Good night, Gault.
It makes me want to cry. I didn't know you knew I liked them. I thought you didn't notice. It was lovely, Geoff. Lovely thought.
You know, you can't hold a woman with a dressing table and a few chairs.
It would have made me happier than anything in the world, to know that you'd failed with Fair.
